title: 2021 Rookie Review Show + Dynasty Outlooks, Let's Get Spicy - Fantasy Football Podcast for 2/17
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode!! Follow now for year-round fantasy football content! On today’s fantasy football podcast, a deep dive into the rookies from the 2021 fantasy season. Who has a chance to take a step forward in year two? Plus, what’s the outlook for Cam Akers following the Super Bowl? Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for February 17th, 2022.

The 2022 UDK is available for pre-order at UltimateDraftKit.com -- Get instant access to the Dynasty Pass with the UDK+
(05:05) - Cam Akers Outlook
(10:25) - 2021 Rookie Review
(11:00) - Rookie Quarterbacks (Lawrence, Wilson, Lance, Fields, Jones)
(30:10) - Rookie Running Backs (Najee Harris, Elijah Mitchell, Michael Carter)
(47:55) - Rookie Wide Receivers (Ja’Marr Chase, Jaylen Waddle, Amon-Ra St. Brown, DeVonta Smith)
(01:05:50) - Rookie Tight Ends (Kyle Pitts, Pat Freiermuth)

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
